text:
The great <@U69EQD0CD> has submitted the first notebook to the *live PlutoCon 2021 demo page*:

<https://plutocon2021-demos.netlify.app/>

Check it out, get inspired, and <https://github.com/JuliaPluto/PlutoCon2021-demos#how-do-i-submit-a-notebook|submit your own notebooks>! This is your chance to turn your `@bind` notebooks into a cool live web page!

text: Very neat! How do you get reactivity of the sliders in the html version? I don't think I've ever had a UI element work in exported html versions (mainly buttons and number fields though).
